dublinCore.dc:title: 114 HR 2556 IH: To amend the Federal Water Pollution Control Act to repeal the authorization for program development and implementation grants for coastal recreation water quality monitoring and notification, and for other purposes.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Salmon introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

form.official-title: To amend the Federal Water Pollution Control Act to repeal the authorization for program development and implementation grants for coastal recreation water quality monitoring and notification, and for other purposes.

section.header: Repeal of program development and implementation grants authorization
section.text: Section 406(b) of the Federal Water Pollution Control Act (33 U.S.C. 1346(b)) is amended by adding at the end the following new paragraph:

paragraph.text: The Administrator may not make a grant to a State or local government under this subsection after the date of enactment of this paragraph.
